import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ResumeProfilsComponent} from "../../../pages/resume-profils/resume-profils.component"; import {CoreModule} from "../../core.module"; import {OverviewComponent} from "../../../pages/overview/overview.component"; import {SidebarService} from "../../services/sidebar.service"; import {NgIf} from "@angular/common"; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', standalone: true, imports: [ ResumeProfilsComponent, CoreModule, OverviewComponent, NgIf ], templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrl: './sidebar.component.scss' }) export class SidebarComponent implements OnInit { isSidebarOpen = false; constructor(private sidebarService: SidebarService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.sidebarService.sidebarOpen$.subscribe(isOpen=>{ this.isSidebarOpen = isOpen }) } toggleSidebar() { this.isSidebarOpen = !this.isSidebarOpen; } closeSidebar(): void { this.sidebarService.closeSidebar() } }
